Subject: drillBit and Dollen fight back! 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He avoides Jackle's shot to the head, but it left a gash. Gremlin's shot
struck, sending DrillBit crashing in to a boulder. The way he hit would
have also had Jackle's head smash into the boulder.
He fired optics back at Gremlin. He sent a good strong punch at Jackle's
mouth.

::Dollen::

He rolls out of the way of the firebalss, but the blast from the grenade
sent him flying through the air. After regaining his footing he fired
the maching guns in his insect legs at his attackers.
